black market.translation[0].definitions[: the system by which people illegally buy and sell foreign money, goods that are difficult to obtain etc
Many foods were only available on the black market.
There was a thriving black market in foreign currency.
black market.translation[1].definitions[: the illegal buying and selling of goods that are usually impossible to get in a particular city or country
A pack of foreign cigarettes on the black market goes for the equivalent of at least $17.
the buying of foreign currency at an unofficial rate
The official exchange rate is about 5.6 kyat to the dollar, or more than 10 times its current value on the black market.
